message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell me the product. I would like to counteroffer at $95.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're willing to pay $95, but I'm still hoping to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $100.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $115. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $112.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget and the value of the product, I would like to counteroffer at $105.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $115. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $108.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget and the value of the product, I would like to counteroffer at $102.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $110. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $106.
